title: Student Performance Prediction using CatBoost
features: Built a CatBoost‑based student performance prediction model, achieving a substantial improvement in predictive accuracy over baseline algorithms.
Performed rigorous EDA with pandas, seaborn, and matplotlib, uncovering key socio‑economic and academic variables that informed feature engineering.
Engineered a Flask API for real‑time inference, integrating the model into a scalable web service that serves predictions to educators and administrators.
